comment: He has a hard time seeing so some times if you raise your hand during attendance he WILL mark you absent somehow. his class is very very boring. he gives 4 assignments, 1 midterm, and 1 final = your final grade.

Hard of hearing, old school, and incredibly boring. Graded on 4 homework assignments and 2 tests. Full credit should be expected on all homeworks as they are all bullsnot work. Tests are easy if you goto class or even have a decent grasp on computers. Everyone should be able to pass with Schroeder if not get an A.

Old and out of touch. Excited about transition from Vacuum tubes to transistors. Brought in real examples to let us share in his excitement. We elected one person a week from the dorm hall to go to class and collect assignments if they're given. Joke Class. Book still wrapped in cellophane
The class was only an introductory course, however he did a good job scratching the surface of computer science. Anyone who expected an advanced computer science course was probably dissapointed.

Class is boring as all and his monotonal voice doesnt help the process. I thought I was going to get a D in the class but I got an A so the curve was obviously amazing. Boring class (its required), boring teacher (only one who teachers it), but its an easy A as long as you somewhat pay attention in class. Study past tests for the final!!!!

this guy is ****ing lame! 70% of the class failed his first 2 quizzes, he finaly realized they were too hard and gave us an easier one. But in the end he did curve the grades because i somehow got an A. Class is incredibly boring, and he is horrible at teaching the content, but its not that hard to pull off and A after the curve. HORRIBLE TEACHER!

A very nice man, however, he does have some age on him and he is somewhat unclear about certain things.  The class itself is difficult to make interesting just because of the material, but he does try his best.
I agree he is easy however he doesnt teach very well
Easy, but not a very good teacher
